review: Love this thing...much more than I expected.
author: Mr. Sunshine

review: Overrall good, glitches here and there.
author: Star

review: I've had a roku and chromecast, but this has been the easiest to work with. Since I travel a lot, it's nice not to have to depend on hotel cable for evening viewing.
author: clsact

review: I like the Fire Stick.  It does need to be unplugged and plugged back in on occasion. It stutters a bit too. But over all I like it as well as any of the streaming devices that I have tried.
author: Sherri

review: I absolutely love the fire TVstick.  Amazon prime Has an extensive library of shows and movies; the Fire TV stick lets me watch them on my big screen tv and not just my Kindle. I love that it works with Netflix and other subscriptions. Gives me lots of options.Very easy to hook up! I've had a couple of buffering instances during a show (not enough bandwidth) but I'm not sure that isn't my internet issue vs the fire TV stick.
author: R. Cordova

review: Best part is it was very easy to install and it works great.
author: Martin Knutson

review: Works for me. I can get PBS Video and Netflix as well as Amazon Video.
author: alphazetaomega
